title: Federation Teams Remove Team Actions
custom_preconds:
Wireframe: https://zpl.io/V45AlDN

GIVEN user is logged in as a BOC Admin
AND user wants to delete a federation team 
AND user is viewing a federation team
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks the trash can icon next to a team in the tournament
custom_expected:
THEN system should display the Delete Federation Team modal 
AND modal Header should display "Delete Federation Team?" 
AND in the body, system should display "Are you sure you want to delete the following Federation Team? 
AND below that system should display the team's flag and name 
AND the form should have a delete button
AND clicking delete should delete the team from the tournament and bring the user back to the federation teams page and display a green "Deleted" confirmation message
BUT deleting the club should not delete any associated prospective player or roster information 
AND the club should be removed from displaying in any club list dropdowns (example, prospective player list page) 
AND if a user is logged in as a federation user their roster tabs should be hidden
AND if the user clicks the cancel button,  system should close the modal and take the user back to the federation teams page
AND this process should only remove the team from the UI for the current tournament

title: Federation Teams Modal Actions
custom_preconds:
Wireframe: https://zpl.io/amdRoP9

GIVEN a user is logged in as BOC admin
AND user wants the ability to add federation teams to a tournament year so that the teams are available to federations for roster management
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to the tournament management page
custom_expected:
THEN system should display an "Add Federation Teams" button
AND this clicking this button should trigger a modal
AND the modal should have an "Add Federation Teams" header
AND the modal should have an "X"
AND clicking the "X" should close the modal
AND the modal should have a searchable multi-select input
AND typing a country name should display a list of potential matches
AND selecting a result should add it to the input 
AND the user should be able to click enter to add an option when it's highlighted
AND after clicking enter the field should still be in focus so the user can continue searching for options
AND only valid results should be allowed to be added to the input field
AND clicking the "X" next to the result should remove it from the input
AND the modal should have a save button
AND the save button should not activate until there is at least one valid result in the input field
AND clicking save should add the team(s) in the input field to the tournament section relative to where the Add Teams button was clicked (Qualifying or main tournament)
AND the modal should close and a green "saved" notification icon (https://zpl.io/awJd8oM) should appear on the Federation Teams Management page. 
AND there should be a cancel button that is always active
AND clicking the cancel button should close the modal
AND when a federation team is added to a tournament, system should add them to any relevant team selection dropdowns
AND when a federation team is added, system should unhide the roster tabs for federation users

title: Create Prospective Player List Page
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC Admin, Federation Admin, or Federation User

*Design: * https://zpl.io/aMpOK5o
custom_steps: WHEN navigating to Prospective Player List page
custom_expected:
THEN a BOC admin will have a dropdown that allows them to switch between Federation teams. 
AND the dropdown should only display teams that have been added to a tournament via the manage tournament screen. 
AND  the countries in the dropdown should be sorted by alpha descending 
AND all users who can access this page will see a search bar. Typing the name of a user will filter the list with relevant results. 
AND show a list of all prospective players for that federation. 
AND each player will have the following columns. 
--Last name 
--First name 
--Ext Last 
--Middle Name 
--Pos 
--Bats/Throws 
--Org 
--Club 
--Ebis ID 
--IL Days 
--40 man flag 
--Birth Date 
--Birth Country
